Class ROCScoreMethodParameter

java.lang.Object
  evs.metric.parameters.IntegerParameter
      evs.metric.parameters.ROCScoreMethodParameter
All Implemented Interfaces:
MetricParameter
public final class ROCScoreMethodParameter
extends IntegerParameter

Records the method used to compute the empirical ROC score.

Version:
4.0
Author:
evs@hydrosolved.com
